subtasks: Dig up the main water line near the water meter.
Connect valves to the main irrigation line.
Use a water-powered boring kit under driveways.
Install flexible swing joints for sprinkler heads.
Bury direct burial wire with PVC conduit.
Protect wires with a coil for surge protection.
Install rain sensor above sprinkler area.
Flush backflow device and open test cocks.
Connect controller terminals to zone wires.
Adjust sprinkler heads for proper coverage.
Connect and adjust HEVAN and RVAN nozzles.
